Name: Brick Blaster
About the game: Brick Blaster is a traditional brick breaking game. Featuring 100 levels to complete. There are power-ups to grab, new paddles to unlock, and bosses to defeat. Plus an Endless game mode is available, allowing for unlimited game play! Features 100 levels across 5 Challenge sections to play through. Bosses to defeat at the end of each Challenge section. Power Ups and Power Downs to catch. An Endless game mode offering unlimited play.
Meta Title: Brick Blaster: May 5, 2020, Cryodragon and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Brick Blaster? Check out the release date (May 5, 2020), developer insights from Cryodragon, and a complete game summary.
